data.eml:eml: The first Korean species of Euconnus (Cladoconnus), with a synopsis of the E. ussuriensis species group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2019): The first Korean species of Euconnus (Cladoconnus), with a synopsis of the E. ussuriensis species group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4615 (3): 481-488, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4615.3.4
